ezxpns.GUI
Class UIControl

java.lang.Object
  ezxpns.GUI.UIControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecordListView.RecordEditor
public class UIControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordListView.RecordEditor

To assist EzXpns in managing all the GUI Windows

To create a UI Manager.

Parameters:
searchHandlerRef - the reference to the search handling logic component
recHandlerRef - the reference to the record handling logic component
incomeHandlerRef - the reference to the income category handling logic component
expenseHandlerRef - the reference to the expense category handling logic component
targetMgrRef - the reference to the target management logic component
rptGenRef - the reference to the report generator logic component
sumGenRef - the reference to the summary generator logic component
